snippet: Anticipating potential tourism revenue, the cities are fighting over the remains of King Richard III just days after his bones were found in a parking lot.
abstract: English cities of Leicester and York are embroiled in dispute over where to bury remains of King Richard III, discovered under Leicester parking lot, as both towns anticipate tourist revenues that housing his bones will bring.
lead_paragraph: Anticipating potential tourism revenue, the cities are fighting over the remains of King Richard III just days after his bones were found in a parking lot.

headline.seo: Leicester and York Debate Where Richard III Should Be Reburied
headline.main: Cities of Leicester and York Argue Over Where to Rebury Richard III
headline.print_headline: Cities of Leicester and York Argue Over Where to Rebury Richard III
